mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.work_model_id AS "workModelId", a.device_code AS "deviceCode", a.parameter_id AS "parameterId", a.parameter_value AS "parameterValue", a.time_point AS "timePoint", a.enabled_flag AS "enabledFlag", a.version AS "version", a.updated_dt AS "updatedDt", a.updated_by AS "updatedBy", a.created_dt AS "createdDt", a.created_by AS "createdBy", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.parameter_name AS "parameterName", a.com_code AS "comCode", a.modu_code AS "moduCode", a.prof_code as "profCode"ï¼Œ a.targets as "targets", a.old_id as "oldId"
mapper.select: SELECT a.CONTROL_CODE,c.* from RUAG_MODEL_TEMPLATE a LEFT JOIN RUAG_WORK_MODEL_DATAIL b on a.id=b.model_template_id LEFT JOIN RUAG_MODEL_DEVICE_PARAMER_SET c on b.id=c.work_model_id where a.STATUS='1' and a.COM_CODE=#{comCode}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ruag_optimization_parameter_set( id, work_model_id, device_code, parameter_id, parameter_value, time_point, enabled_flag, version, updated_dt, updated_by, created_dt, created_by, remarks, parameter_name, com_code, modu_code, prof_code, old_id, targets ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{workModelId}, #{deviceCode}, #{parameterId}, #{parameterValue}, #{timePoint}, #{enabledFlag}, #{version}, #{updatedDt}, #{updatedBy}, #{createdDt}, #{createdBy}, #{remarks}, #{parameterName}, #{comCode}, #{moduCode}, #{profCode}, #{oldId}, #{targets} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ruag_optimization_parameter_set SET work_model_id = #{workModelId}, device_code = #{deviceCode}, parameter_id = #{parameterId}, parameter_value = #{parameterValue}, time_point = #{timePoint}, enabled_flag = #{enabledFlag}, version = #{version}, updated_dt = #{updatedDt}, updated_by = #{updatedBy}, created_dt = #{createdDt}, created_by = #{createdBy}, remarks = #{remarks}, parameter_name = #{parameterName}, com_code = #{comCode}, modu_code = #{moduCode}, prof_code=#{profCode} WHERE id = #{id}

UPDATE RUAG_MODEL_DEVICE_PARAMER_SET a set a.parameter_value=(SELECT b.parameter_value from (SELECT * from RUAG_OPTIMIZATION_PARAMETER_SET where work_model_id=#{workModelId} and targets=#{targets}) b where a.id=b.old_id), a.time_point=(SELECT b.time_point from (SELECT * from RUAG_OPTIMIZATION_PARAMETER_SET where work_model_id=#{workModelId} and targets=#{targets}) b where a.id=b.old_id) where a.WORK_MODEl_ID=#{workModelId}
